name: cakejs2
description: Lightweight front-end framework with only best parts and features of most awesome frameworks.

scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run mocha
scripts.cov: nyc npm run ci && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.prepublish: mkdir dist && browserify contrib/dist.js | uglifyjs -c > dist/cake.min.js

author: Svetlana Linuxenko <linuxenko@yahoo.com> (http://www.linuxenko.pro)
